subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Basketball
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony and Deron Williams scored 19 points apiece, and the United States men’s Olympic basketball team beat Britain, 118-78, in an exhibition game in Manchester, England.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony and Deron Williams scored 19 points apiece, and the United States men’s Olympic basketball team beat Britain, 118-78, in an exhibition game in Manchester, England.
